data.name: Old Beta Version
data.description:
ARKIO IS NOW LIVE ON THE QUEST STORE! 
This App Lab version will not continue to receive updates. Search for Arkio on the Quest App Store and install the new version instead to get access to all the latest features like Meta Avatar support, passthrough modeling, Unity integration and more.

changelog.change_log:
Improvements:
Improved license code input for mobile and Quest
Removed file permission request on Quest (moved user files to app directory)
Improved stability when switching between large files
Place Revit exports as objects
Starting orientation to the table front on all VR platforms
Improved BIM 360 web portal stability and user interface
Educational license tag
Click on the license tag to open license settings
Support for manually deploying license codes on Windows
Various updates and bugfixes

New Arkio features:
Meetings now have edit and viewer rights
Viewers can create temporary sketches in meetings
Free 1on1 meetings and pro meetings with up to 24 people
New license and in-app free trial system
New self-service subscription and payment web portal
Enterprise users can temporarily promote viewers to editors in a meeting
Arkio to Rhino now exports Arkio objects to Rhino blocks
Arkio for Revit 2018 plugin added (import and export)
Saved views in Arkio can now export back to Revit and Rhino

Improvements:
Significant performance increase for Arkio on Oculus Quest and other devices
Support for larger Arkio scenes with more movable components
Improved triangulation when working with complex shapes
Multiuser editing stability increased
Meetings audio quality enhancements
Improved saved views and gathering many users in a meeting
Automatic meeting reloading if users get out of sync
Fixed various Revit and Rhino geometry importing and exporting bugs
Support for exporting more complex Arkio scenes to native Revit geometry
Avoid unnecessary scenes duplication during meetings
Auto expanding and minimized UI based on your edit rights
Pro and Enterprise notifications for paid features
Fixed various Arkio modeling bugs
Fixed various UI bugs

New Arkio features:
Export from Arkio to SketchUp using our plugin (included in the Windows Installer)

Improvements:
Minor guide improvements
Revit export plugin stability
Improved section placement
Fixed bug with Revit models coming in at the wrong scale
Fixed a startup issue with Oculus for Business Devices

New Arkio features:
The meeting host can now mute and unmute other users in a meeting
BIM 360 models can now be directly opened from the cloud panel

Improvements:
2x faster startup time on Oculus Quest
Fixed an import issue for users with foreign regional time settings (PC, Android, and Quest)
Improved laser snapping to work in finer detail with more precision
Improved mic echo cancelation
Fixed an issue with microphones not responding on some PC's
Maps feature improved to correctly load on devices
Fixed BIM 360 model import bugs
Error note when models failed to import or export
Fixed an issue where imported models could no longer be deleted after modeling
Improved plane constraining for arrayed geometry
Fixed multiuser copy and undo bug
Various bugfixes

New Arkio features:
All props and imported models can now be painted with Arkio materials
SketchUp to Arkio export plugin (SketchUp Make 2017, SketchUp Pro 2019, 2020, and 2021)
Arkio is now available for Mac OSX

Improvements:
Improved tutorial with more in-depth info cards
Improved copy and arraying of geometry
Model export notifications
Section tool placement improvements
Avoiding the creation of unwanted small geometry
Improved grabbing of small objects by hand
Fixed maps not loading on some PC's
Fixed various modeling and hosting bugs
Fixed various UI bugs

New Arkio features:

Comfort vignette for two-handed grip scaling/rotating
Arkio is now publicly available on the Google Play store

Improvements:

Shadow visibility settings (on, off)
Comfort vignette settings (off, low, medium, high)
Rendering and section UI now updates correctly based on meeting settings
The main VR menu on the left hand is now less sensitive to open
Fixed Excel program import sizes
Teleport improvements
Multiuser avatars no longer casting shadows
Teleport improvements
Fixed various small UI and modeling bugs

Section and program/material rendering mode now synchronized among all meeting participants. Simplified geometry when exporting from Rhino using the Arkio Rhino Plugin. Export from Arkio to Rhino now available on all platforms. Minor updates and bug fixes.
